basic.description:
Lecture series on the following topics: principles of drug action, autonomic pharmacology, cardiovascular-renal pharmacology, neuropsychopharmacology, chemotherapy, drugs acting on the endocrine system, over-the-counter drugs, and therapeutic applications. 
NOTE    Given in Winter Term and concurrently with students in the School of Nursing.
basic.subject: PHAR
basic.title: Pharmacology for the Health Sciences

extra.enrollment_requirement:
COREQUISITE    PHGY 210/6.0 or PHGY 214/6.0 or KNPE 225/3.0 or KINE 225/3.0. 
EXCLUSIONS    No more than 3.0 units from PHAR 230; PHAR270; PHAR340
